data.name: CreateError
data.value: An error occurred while creating the product.

data.name: UpdateConcurrencyError
data.value: Concurrency error while updating the product.

data.name: UpdateError
data.value: An error occurred while updating the product.

data.name: DeleteError
data.value: An error occurred while deleting the product.

data.name: BarcodeLength
data.value: Barcode must be between 6 and 7 characters.

data.name: BarcodeUsedByOther
data.value: This barcode is used by another product.

data.name: SerialUsedByOther
data.value: This serial number is used by another product.
